channel.title: Grades?
channel.description:
So how often do you study? Play games? or just kill time? And post your avrage grade please :D
Use this format
App. study time/weekly: App. Playing/weekly: App. Killing time: App. GPA:
Just wanna know also how much time you spend on this site. :)

item.title: Grades?
item.dc:creator: @kyledibiase kyledibiase
item.description:
@kyledibiase wrote:

lol i dont go to school…so i cant post that.

Read full topic

item.title: Grades?
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

I guess, but in Canada I guess that’s pretty good, unless there was the same standards and the school system didn’t change every place you go, we could officially say that “your GPA is good, or bad”

item.title: Grades?

@xxlegitxx wrote:

GPA is so meaningless… it varies way too much from school to school.

item.title: Grades?
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

App. study time/weekly: every time i have a chance, im applying for university and need good marks (my normal study time, when im not just fitting in every 10 minutes i have, is like 6 hours daily)
App. Playing/weekly: rarely, i might be able to get in maybe 1 and a half hour of xbox a week
App. Killing time: no time to kill
App. GPA: 4.9

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Songoty Songoty
item.description:
@Songoty wrote:

I live in canada, so i dont have a GPA but ill put my average.
App. study time/weekly: 0
App. Playing/weekly: 3-4 hours a week, but on weekeend alot-10 hours a weekend
App. Killing time: 4 hours a week and weekends
App. GPA: 85.6 percent i belive

item.title: Grades?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

App. study time/weekly: 0

App. Playing/weekly: Depends. If I’m addicted to a game it could be a lot, more then I would like to admit. If I’m not, it’s probably 0. Oh, I probably put at least 45 minutes into NHL08 every weekend though, but I’m getting bored of the NHL game series.

App. Killing time: Not really sure what you mean by killing time :S Would games not also count as killing time? Well I know I definitely kill lots of time but too hard to calculate this as it’s not really defined.

App. GPA: Probably 1 (purely by choice).

Read full topic

item.title: Grades?
item.dc:creator: @3.65_kilos 3.65 kilos
item.description:
@3.65_kilos wrote:

App. study time/weekly: 0 hours
App. Playing/weekly: However many hours I’m not in school
App. Killing time: However many hours I’m not in school
App. GPA: They don’t tell us and I’m too lazy to figure it out

Lowest grade(s): 88 in Geometry Honors, 89 in English I Honors. I’d say that’s not too bad.

Read full topic

item.title: Grades?
item.dc:creator: @Bebemycat2 Bebe
item.description:
@Bebemycat2 wrote:

Meh, I do good in school depending on how I feel that day. If I’m tired/angry/upset or anything else were I just don’t feel like doing anything then I just say fuck it and leave, but if I stay then I do good, and usually score within the top 5 in my class.

Read full topic

item.title: Grades?
item.dc:creator: @u_no_i_own_u u no i own u
item.description:
@u_no_i_own_u wrote:

App. study time/weekly: 1-2 hours (I always get distracted :O)
App. Playing/weekly: 15+ hours
App. Killing time: I kill a whole lot of time on the weekends
App. GPA: c+ - B+ (I have a A- in P.E. but thats all)

item.title: Grades?
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:28, topic:148227”][quote author=Bobby link=topic=203240.msg1833065#msg1833065 date=1192876741]
grades and GPA’s are uncompeable. If he is smart (or asian :P) and gets really hard teaches and you get easy ones then, you can both have all a’s but he does 3x more work. also standardized tests for middle schoolers are lame. Its incredibly easy and I don’t undestand how poeple don’t get 95’s or higher ( then again since they compare how well you did against the rest of th country, if everyone got 95’s, then that woul be a 0)
[/quote]

Yea, SAT’s are better, but also pretty stupid.

thats because the majority dont care about life, i dont want to be rasist or anything but most high school drop outs are those who are african american, (its a proven fact dont spam me) they have the lowest grade scores for they think that there gonna be safed by their parents when older, which in fact not many dont

Of course they care about life. They’re not emo. They just don’t care about the same things as you do, you ethnocentrist asshole. And btw, Hispanics drop out much more that African Americans, so check your facts before making blanket statements. [/quote]

thats what i guessed. it just always amazes me how people can fail these things.

Read full topic

item.title: Grades?
item.dc:creator: @Enjoy_me_now Enjoy me now
item.description:
@Enjoy_me_now wrote:

[quote=“Bobby, post:26, topic:148227”][quote author=xxlegitxx link=topic=203240.msg1827838#msg1827838 date=1192667150]

smart… how does a 6th grader take a 12th grade test? and 6th graders hadly know what their test scroes are and gpas dont vary, they only do if you leave in a diffrent country or state

Actually it’s an 11th grade test. Also, I took the SAT’s in 7th grade and got a 1210. GPA’s vary from school to school. My GPA as number 8 in the class is 4.431. My friend in a neighboring township is number 2 in his class with a 3.90. He got 10 points higher than me on the SAT. As you can see, GPA’s vary fairly widely.
[/quote]
grades and GPA’s are uncompeable. If he is smart (or asian :P) and gets really hard teaches and you get easy ones then, you can both have all a’s but he does 3x more work. also standardized tests for middle schoolers are lame. Its incredibly easy and I don’t undestand how poeple don’t get 95’s or higher ( then again since they compare how well you did against the rest of th country, if everyone got 95’s, then that woul be a 0)[/quote]

thats because the majority dont care about life, i dont want to be rasist or anything but most high school drop outs are those who are african american, (its a proven fact dont spam me) they have the lowest grade scores for they think that there gonna be safed by their parents when older, which in fact not many dont
